title: Homepage Load and Display
description: Verify that the homepage loads successfully with hero carousel, featured products, and category navigation displayed correctly on desktop and mobile devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage on desktop viewport
Verify hero carousel is visible and functional
Verify featured products section is displayed with correct items
Verify category navigation menu is present and usable
Resize viewport to mobile size
Verify homepage reflows responsively and all key components remain accessible and usable

title: Product Listing Filtering and Sorting
description: Verify filters (main category, subcategory, price, color, size) and sorting options correctly filter and reorder product listings without page reload.

steps.description: Navigate to product listing page
Apply filter by main category
Verify product items displayed belong only to selected main category
Apply filter by subcategory
Verify product items displayed belong to both main and selected subcategory
Apply filter by price range
Verify all displayed products fall within selected price range
Apply color and size filters
Verify products match selected color and size filters
Sort products by price ascending
Verify product listings are sorted by price low to high
Sort products by popularity or newest
Verify product listings reorder accordingly

title: Product Detail Display and Variant Selection
description: Ensure product detail page correctly displays image gallery, variant options (size, color), pricing updates, and add-to-cart functionality with stock validation.

steps.description: Navigate to a product detail page
Verify main product image and thumbnail gallery are visible and operational
Check variant options for size and color are displayed and selectable
Select each variant combination and observe price and availability update
Verify price changes accordingly and correct stock availability is shown
Attempt to add available variant to cart with quantity exceeding stock
Verify appropriate validation message prevents adding invalid quantity
Add valid quantity of selected variant to cart
Verify item is added to cart and cart count updates

title: Shopping Cart Management
description: Validate cart page operations including item quantity updates, removals, and order summary with dynamic shipping cost calculation.

steps.description: Add multiple items with different variants to the cart
Navigate to the cart page
Verify all added items, variants, quantities, and prices are displayed correctly
Update quantity of one item within stock limits
Verify quantity updates and order summary recalculates totals correctly
Attempt to update quantity exceeding available stock
Verify error message is shown and operation is prevented
Remove one item from the cart
Verify item is removed and order summary updates accordingly
Verify shipping cost is calculated dynamically based on order details

title: Checkout Process with WhatsApp Integration
description: Verify full checkout process captures customer and shipping details, generates unique order number, reserves inventory, and triggers correct WhatsApp order confirmation message.

steps.description: Navigate to checkout page with items in cart
Fill in all required customer information fields (name, phone, email)
Fill in shipping address details completely and correctly
Select payment method if applicable
Place the order
Verify a unique order number is generated and displayed
Verify system reserves inventory for ordered items
Verify automated WhatsApp message with order details is generated and sent to customer

title: User Registration and Login Authentication
description: Ensure new users can register with phone number, and existing users can login securely with session persistence and error handling for invalid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Fill in registration form with valid data including phone number
Submit registration
Verify account is created and user is logged in automatically or redirected appropriately
Logout and navigate to login page
Attempt login with correct credentials
Verify login is successful and session is persisted on page reload
Logout and attempt login with incorrect credentials
Verify proper error message is shown and access is denied

title: User Profile and Order History Management
description: Verify logged-in users can access and update profile info, manage saved addresses, and view complete past order history accurately.

steps.description: Login as registered user
Navigate to user profile page
Update personal information and save changes
Verify updates persist and reflect correctly
Navigate to manage addresses page
Add a new shipping address
Verify new address is saved and appears in address list
Edit and delete existing addresses
Verify address updates and removals are reflected accurately
Navigate to order history page
Verify list shows all past orders with correct statuses and details
Select an order to view detailed order information
Verify order details page displays correct items, quantities, prices, and status

title: Admin Dashboard Overview and Metrics
description: Confirm admin dashboard loads statistics, latest orders, and quick action links correctly and updates in real-time where applicable.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to admin dashboard page
Verify overview metrics (total sales, orders, customers) are displayed correctly
Verify recent orders list loads with appropriate information and links
Trigger refresh or simulate new order addition
Verify dashboard updates to reflect new data in real-time or on manual refresh

title: Admin Product Management CRUD Operations
description: Test create, read, update, and delete functionality for products and their variants within the admin panel.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to admin products management page
Create a new product with complete details including variants
Verify new product appears in product list with accurate details
Select a product to edit
Update product details such as name, price, variants
Verify updates are saved and reflected in product list and detail views
Delete a product
Verify product is removed from listing and cannot be accessed

title: Admin Order Management and Status Updates
description: Verify admin can view detailed order information, update order statuses, and see changes reflected immediately.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to admin order management page
Select an order from the list to view details
Verify order details display items, customer info, status, and timestamps correctly
Update order status (e.g. from 'Pending' to 'Shipped')
Verify status update is saved and reflected in order list and user order history

title: Admin User Management and Order History Access
description: Ensure admin can view user lists, access individual user details and order histories, and perform user-related operations.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to admin users management page
Select a user from the user list
Verify detailed user profile information is displayed
Access the selected user's order history
Verify order history lists all orders correctly with statuses and details

title: Static Informational Pages Rendering
description: Verify FAQs, contact, shipping policy, returns, terms of service, and privacy policy pages load correctly with appropriate content and UI functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to FAQs page
Verify all FAQs are displayed and answers expand/collapse correctly
Navigate to contact page
Verify contact form and business contact info are visible and functional
Navigate to shipping, returns, terms, and privacy policy pages
Verify each page loads appropriate static content with proper formatting

title: Responsive UI Verification
description: Test UI responsiveness and mobile-first design across different device sizes ensuring layout, navigation, and functionality remain intact.

steps.description: Load site on desktop resolution
Verify all UI components load correctly and navigation menus are accessible
Resize viewport to tablet resolution
Verify UI reflows properly, menus collapse or expand as intended
Simulate mobile device viewport
Verify mobile navigation menu, buttons, and content remain usable and visually consistent

title: API Endpoint Functional and Error Handling Tests
description: Verify that all API endpoints respond with expected status codes and data formats on valid and invalid inputs, including error scenarios.

steps.description: Send valid request to product listing API with filters
Verify response status 200 and data matches filter criteria
Send invalid request with malformed filters to product listing API
Verify response status 400 or appropriate error code with error message
Send valid request to checkout API with complete order data
Verify response status 201 and order number returned
Send request with missing required checkout fields
Verify response status 422 with field validation errors

title: Security Testing for Authentication and CSRF/XSS Prevention
description: Validate security measures for user authentication flows and protection against common vulnerabilities such as CSRF and XSS attacks.

steps.description: Attempt login with XSS payload in username or password fields
Verify input is sanitized and no script execution or error occurs
Perform CSRF attack simulation by submitting forged form requests
Verify requests are rejected or validated against CSRF tokens
Attempt unauthorized access to admin pages without login
Verify access is denied and user is redirected to login
Test session persistence and expiration behavior after login
Verify sessions time out appropriately and user is logged out

title: Performance and Loading Time Checks
description: Ensure all main pages including homepage, product listing, product detail, cart, and checkout load within target time thresholds on typical network conditions.

steps.description: Measure page load time for homepage under standard network conditions
Verify load time is within performance target (e.g. under 3 seconds)
Measure product listing page load time with multiple filters applied
Verify load and filter update times are performant without full page reload
Measure load times for product detail page, cart, and checkout pages
Verify each page loads efficiently with quick interactivity
